title: Slides: “Bayesian Bias Correction: Critically evaluating sets of studies in the presence of publication bias”
dc:creator: Alex Etz
description: I recently gave a lab presentation on the work we have been doing to attempt to mitigate the nefarious effects of publication bias, and I thought I’d share the slides here.
